stasis_strike_lht.name: Stasis Strike [LHT]
stasis_strike_lht.desc: Your crystal explosions deal more damage whenever your opponent is also bottom frozen.

frozen_anchor_lht.name: Frozen Anchor [LHT]
frozen_anchor_lht.desc: Apply bottom freeze and chill to your opponent whenever you land a flourish, uppercut, or crit. 10s CD.

unyielding_frost.name: Unyielding Frost
unyielding_frost.desc: Your Chill can proc through block, with blocked Chilling proc lasting 80% of the duration.

bottom_freeze.name: Bottom Freeze
bottom_freeze.desc: Hitting chilled enemies with ice projectiles while they are on ice freezes them to the ground.

saint_jay.name: Saint Jay
saint_jay.desc: When a Chilled enemy receives a heal, it's nullified and 60% of the healing is redirected to you. While this is active and they are on ice your rate of healing is increased.

frozen_pin-cushion.name: Frozen Pin-Cushion
frozen_pin-cushion.desc: Hitting an opponent with your Ice Daggers causes them to freeze.

stasis_strike_hvy.name: Stasis Strike [HVY]
stasis_strike_hvy.desc: Your crystal explosions deal more damage whenever your opponent is also bottom frozen.

frost_buster.name: Frost Buster
frost_buster.desc: Greatsword and Greathammer criticals now place Ice underneath the path they carve.

frozen_anchor_hvy.name: Frozen Anchor [HVY]
frozen_anchor_hvy.desc: Apply bottom freeze and chill to your opponent whenever you land a flourish, uppercut, or crit. 10s CD.

frostbite.name: Frostbite
frostbite.desc: Enemies can no longer heal when under the effect of your chill.

cryonis.name: Cryonis
cryonis.desc: All ice spells casted on top of ice cost less Ether.

stasis_strike_med.name: Stasis Strike [MED]
stasis_strike_med.desc: Your crystal explosions deal more damage whenever your opponent is also bottom frozen.

frozen_anchor_med.name: Frozen Anchor [MED]
frozen_anchor_med.desc: Apply bottom freeze and chill to your opponent whenever you land a flourish, uppercut, or crit. 10s CD.
